comment.author: 96248370@N07
comment._content: As vfelvey suggested this may be Northfield airport.   By 1952 most of the small local airfields were gone.  My first guess had been Hermitage Airport (aka Charles Field, Eagle Rock Airport) which was located near what is today’s I-95/I-64 interchange; but apparently closed c. 1949.   Northfield closed in 1968.   The area today is the Ashbury at Stoneleigh subdivision near the intersection of East Parham Rd and 301.
